summary: Iteration 23 Testing Complete - All features verified. RSS image_url extraction is NOW WORKING (10/15 items have real images from Vanguard/Premium Times). Framer Motion animations, mobile nav spacing, forgot password page, and ResponsiveTabView all working correctly.
critical_code_review_comments: PASS: RSS image_url extraction in server.py (lines 183-240) is working - extracts images from media:content, media:thumbnail, enclosures, and HTML img tags
PASS: NewsItem Pydantic model (line 88) correctly includes image_url field
PASS: Framer Motion animations in DashboardPage.js with containerVariants and cardVariants working correctly
PASS: Mobile nav spacing (mb-14 md:mb-0) in DashboardLayout.js line 26 working - no content overlap
PASS: ForgotPasswordPage.js has all required elements with data-testid attributes
PASS: AuthPage.js has [Recover_Key] link (data-testid='forgot-password-link') navigating to /forgot-password
PASS: AccountPage.js ResponsiveTabView with correct tab IDs (broadcast-hours, signals-processed, primary-region)
test_credentials: Guest mode: Click 'Oya, Play' button on landing page
context_for_next_testing_agent: Iteration 23 re-test after RSS image fix. ALL FEATURES WORKING: (1) RSS image_url extraction working - 10/15 items have real images from Vanguard Nigeria and Premium Times feeds, (2) Framer Motion animations on dashboard cards working (opacity transitions to 1), (3) Mobile nav spacing mb-14 working (nav at 788px with 56px height, content ends before nav), (4) Forgot Password page at /forgot-password with Narvo styling working, (5) [Recover_Key] link on auth page navigates correctly, (6) ResponsiveTabView on AccountPage shows 3 tabs on mobile (BROADCAST_HOURS, SIGNALS_PROCESSED, PRIMARY_REGION_STATUS), (7) Theme toggle working (light to dark transition), (8) All sidebar nav links working.

rss_image_extraction.notes: image_url field NOW WORKING - 10/15 items have real image URLs from Vanguard Nigeria (cdn.vanguardngr.com) and Premium Times (premiumtimesng.com). Daily Trust, Al Jazeera don't have images in RSS feeds.

dashboard_featured_card_image.notes: Featured card displays real RSS image: https://cdn.vanguardngr.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/10/Army-recruitment-e1757361327965.jpg

framer_motion_animations.notes: Featured card and stream cards have entrance animations with opacity=1 after animation completes

mobile_nav_spacing.notes: Mobile bottom nav at position 788px (56px height), content ends at 788px with 0px gap - no overlap. mb-14 md:mb-0 working correctly

forgot_password_page.notes: Page loads at /forgot-password with Narvo styling. Has email input (data-testid='reset-email-input'), submit button (data-testid='reset-submit-btn'), back link (data-testid='back-to-auth')

forgot_password_back_link.notes: [BACK_TO_AUTH] link navigates correctly back to /auth page

account_page_responsive_tab_view.notes: Mobile view shows 3 tabs: BROADCAST_HOURS, SIGNALS_PROCESSED, PRIMARY_REGION_STATUS. Tab switching works.

theme_toggle.notes: Light mode (rgb(235,213,171)) to Dark mode (rgb(27,33,26)) toggle working

sidebar_navigation.notes: All 6 sidebar links visible and functional: FEED, DISCOVER, SEARCH, SAVED, BRIEFING, OFFLINE

mocked_data_note: MOCKED: Dubawa fact-check API uses simulated responses based on story_id hash

api_verification.news_with_images: 10/15 items have real image URLs from RSS feeds
